doc.name: ArrayContains
doc.description: Determine whether an element is contained in an array. This actor reads an array from the array input port and an element from the element port parameter and outputs true if the element is contained by the array.
doc.author: Efrat Jaeger and Edward A. Lee
doc.port: Input array. The type of this port is at least an array of the type of the element port.
Boolean output specifying whether the element is contained in the array.
doc.property: The element to test for presence in the array.
